title: Stock Futures Rise as Volatile Trading Persists
sub_head: Investors showed a preference for safe-haven assets including the dollar and U.S. government bonds
body:
U.S. stock futures advanced, putting major indexes on course to extend the whipsaw moves that have injected fresh volatility into markets this week.
Futures for the S&P 500 added 0.8% Friday. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 gained 1.1% and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.7%. All three major indexes fell Thursday, closing at their lowest levels since 2020. Thursdayâ€™s decline reversed a rally in stocks Wednesday.
